name: Spiderweb
effect: A gout of sticky webbing shoots from the caster's outstretched hands. The target must make a DT 14 {{skills.mobility}} saving throw or become {{status.restrained}}, unable to move.

name: Snakebite
effect: The appearance of a serpent lashes out from the caster's outstretched hand, striking towards a target up to 12 feet away. The caster makes a {{skills.nature}} check against the target's mitigation. If successful, the target takes 1d12 {{damage.poison}} damage.

name: Cat's Eye
effect: The target gains the ability to see in the dark, seeing in pitch blackness as if it were dim light, and in dim light as if it were bright light.

name: Fish's lung
effect: The caster gains the ability to breathe water for 1 hour.

name: Eagle's Talons
effect: The caster's hands temporarily grow sharp talons, increasing their unarmed melee damage by 1d6 plus their {{skills.nature}} proficiency in {{damage.piercing}} damage. In addition, they gain advantage on grappling checks.

name: Hawk's Eyes
effect: For one hour, gain advantage on perception checks. You see objects clearly, up to a distance of 10 miles.

name: Raven's Wings
effect: Feathered wings sprout from your back, imbuing you with the ability to fly. The coloration and shape of the wings is unique to each caster, often a reflection of their underlying personality. Casting this spell for the first time is often treated as a coming-of-age ritual in druid circles.

name: Lacerate
effect: You make a horizontal slashing motion with your hands, causing a large spectral paw to slice their air with its claws. Enemies lined up horizontally in front of you must make a {{attr.STR}} saving throw or take 2d12 {{damage.slashing}} damage. On a successful save, they take half damage.

name: Mole
effect: For one hour, gain the ability to tunnel through dirt. Your tunneling speed is one foot per second. Creatures cannot follow you in your burrow unless you expend 1 willpower per 10 feet to make it wide enough to follow.

name: Owl's Wisdom
effect: The caster's {{attr.INT}} increases by 1d8 for 8 hours.

name: Rhino's Hide
effect: If not wearing armor, the caster's skin becomes as tough as a Rhinoceros, increasing their BC by 8 for 5 turns. They also gain resistance to {{damage.acid}}, {damage.lightning}} and {{damage.heat}} damage.

name: Circle of Life
effect: The caster takes 2d6 damage, but the target is healed for thrice that amount. If the caster falls unconscious as a result of casting this spell, the target is healed completely.
